subject: Medicine
title: Genetic Diversity and Survival
description: A 60-second lesson on Genetic Diversity and Survival.

hook.text: A population where everyone is identical is in danger.

buildup.text: One disease could wipe out every member if all are alike.

discovery.text: Genetic diversity means some individuals will survive threats.

twist.text: Cheetahs are so alike that skin grafts rarely get rejected.

climax.text: Their low diversity makes them vulnerable to new diseases.

punchline.text: Difference is a species' insurance policy.

quiz.question: Why is genetic diversity important for a species?
options: It helps some survive new threats
